extendedInfo.description: *** Please read all instructions carefully. ***Not all devices are supported, therefore it is strongly recommended that you try the 'Sixaxis Compatibility Checker' (available for free in the Android Market) before purchasing this app.Finally the wait is over... The ultimate gaming experience awaits! Now you can play games on your phone the way they were meant to be played! Sixaxis Controller allows you to use your Sixaxis and DualShock 3 controllers in many of your favourite games and applications.*** IMPORTANT ***- ROOT access is required!!!- Due to the way pairing is done with the controllers, you need to manually pair your controller with the PC utility 'SixaxisPairTool' (available on the website) and a mini-USB cable. Android 3.1+ users can also pair directly on their devices via USB.- It is highly recommended that you use an ORIGINAL controller. Many after market controllers will not work with this app. If you get a 'Client connected: 1' message, but the lights on your controller continue to flash, it is almost certainly not an original Sony controller.- The fake controllers that are most likely to work (though not guaranteed) are those made by Gasia. If you bought a fake that works but isn't made by Gasia, I'd love to hear from you so I can compile a list of known working controllers.- Be sure to read the instructions in the help menu carefully.Features:- Up to four Sixaxis and DualShock 3 controllers supported at once.- Support as a native gamepad in Android 3.1+ devices. Full support for analog sticks and analog triggers.- Keyboard emulation. Map all buttons and sticks to almost any key available in Android.- Mouse emulation. Configure a button to activate the mouse pointer on devices that support mice (most tablets, and many phones should work).- Touch emulation allows you to map buttons and analog sticks to the screen. Play all your favourite games with full analog support, even those without built-in controller support!This product is not affiliated with, nor authorized, endorsed or licensed in any way by Sony Corporation, its affiliates or subsidiaries. All trademarks are property of their respective holders.For assistance, full instructions and FAQ, visit our website at http://www.dancingpixelstudios.com

reviews.title: Needs update!
reviews.comment: I have a nexus 7 (2013) and the app works great with games that have the gampad mode but games like N.O.V.A 3 OR Modern Combat 4 it doesn\'t work correctly even if I make the profile and enable it. Some buttons do work but I can\'t aim with my right analog or any other button for that matter. I followed all the steps just like I did with my s3 witch in that case it  works flawlessly. I guess it needs to be updated for the nexus 7 (2013)
reviews.author: Rafael Rivera

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: ...but, how do I setup GNES when Sixaxis is setup as GamePad Enabled, the Triangle is the back button etc.  Could you point me in the right direction?  I\'ll update to 5*  I say this because I can\'t get FPse (PSX) to work without GamePad enabled.
reviews.author: Derek Harding

reviews.title: Love it!!
reviews.comment: Great app, never enjoyed emulators like I do now with my tablet and a controller. I look forward now to playing  old school castlevania!! Keep up the great work!!
reviews.author: Dwayne Watts

reviews.title: Note 10.1
reviews.comment: My apologies. I simply restarted my tablet and now the app seems to be working just as perfect as before. Thanks for the speedy response though. Good customer service + a great working app = 5 stars all day. Thanks again.
reviews.author: Jeremie Andrews

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Would be nice to be able to attach touch profiles to apps so you don\'t have to switch them. The attachment should be saved in the touch profile file for easier sharing.  And the Profiles editor should automatically save the background picture as \"profilename\".png aside the profile files so it is easy to pack both files.  Or better a zip format to export / import profiles with a custom extension like \"profil.sixzip\" and a intend to open *.sixzip and import the profil. So the user only have to click a profile file in the browser and it gets imported in sixaxis.
reviews.author: sven buerger

reviews.title: Galaxy s4
reviews.comment: Works great had no problem installing or using this app thanks :)
reviews.author: Robert Rowand

reviews.title: Initial problems however works with most recent update 2 step 2013
reviews.comment: Update: the update installed on 2 Sept 2013 has fixed the issue of Bluetooth connectivity with the tf201. Thank you sir. Excellent work. 5 stars!   I have followed the instructions to the letter but I am still unable to connect my original PS3 controller to my Asus TF201. I am experiencing the same problem that a previous reviewer had. When rewriting the Bluetooth drivers it completely disables my Bluetooth and will not allow it to turn back on. I am also unable to turn it back on via the settings when I close the sixaxis program. The program hangs on a command line within the program that states: Listening for devices. Nothing changes in 10 minutes time. Compatibility mode states my device is supported. I am running CyanogenMod 10.1 on a JB 4.2 shell.
reviews.author: Wolfherd Treznor

reviews.title: Say goodbye to virtual joysticks!
reviews.comment: A great app for any dedicated gamer on Android. Everything works flawlessly. Setting up touch profiles takes a little experimenting but once you figure it out, its great. Maybe a future version could include a little tutorial?
reviews.author: Travis Wolfenberger

reviews.title: Must have app for gamers!!
reviews.comment: This app takes gaming to a whole new level. Well worth the $$
reviews.author: Shamar Marshall

reviews.comment: Awesome!
reviews.author: Fraser M

reviews.title: Works on TMo S4 M919
reviews.comment: T-Mobile Galaxy S4 rooted on Wicked Rom v5. Works great. Love the touch emulation setup and customization. I just take an in-game screenshot of control locations, then setup using the screenshot as the background and then it\'s easy to place button locations. I highly recommend this to FPS and racing gamers.
reviews.author: Steven Wu

reviews.title: Will not work on HTC One
reviews.comment: Needs a major update ! Even rooted or OTG cables will not work. Htc sense manages BT drivers in the ram.
reviews.author: Lisa Lefteye

reviews.title: Good but not perfect
reviews.comment: Analog stick doesn\'t work well when moved fast on touch emulation.
reviews.author: Felix G\303\266hringer

reviews.title: Bluetooth issues. *Fixed*
reviews.comment: Running 4.2.2 rom on xoom wifi and ps3 connects for 1 minute than disconnects. Can\'t get it to connect unless I kill the app and restart it but still connects no longer than a minute. Went back to 4.1.2 rom and seems to work OK but wish it worked for 4.2.2 on my XOOM. GREAT APP!  UPDATE: Found fix for the issue I was experiencing. I had to turn off wifi first than connect ps3 cont. and re-enable wifi and ready to play. Only on cm 10.1 android 4.2.2.
reviews.author: Orlando Carrera

reviews.title: Awsum
reviews.comment: Works great. Wish vibration could work too!
reviews.author: Charl Thiem

reviews.title: Not compatible with HTC One, please fix.
reviews.comment: Please make this compatable with HTC One(m7)! The only way I\'ve gotten to play with Ps3 controller was wired (OTG)and bulletproof kernel.
reviews.author: Adam Weaver

reviews.title: Works a treat
reviews.comment: Well done!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great on HTC One with TrickDroid
reviews.author: Christian Andersen

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Good app. Some touch bugs still
reviews.author: Kim Rene Mossige

reviews.title: Versatile application
reviews.comment: Absolute best driver and toolkit for a gamepad for any mobile platform.  The touch screen profiles makes it possible for the dualshock 3 to work for games that have zero native support. Worth every penny. If you could add support for the move navigation controller (not the wand)  that would be awesome as a mouse replacement for Android TV dongle devices
reviews.author: Andres Reyes
